revised_title: Transition Metal Templates in Cyclization Reactions: Impact on Organic Synthesis
tldr: This article discusses the use of transition metal templates in cyclization reactions to improve the efficiency and selectivity of organic synthesis. The author explores various strategies, including intramolecular carbometallation, macrocyclization, and cycloadditions, and demonstrates their applications in the synthesis of complex organic structures, such as natural products and biologically active molecules.
